Breadcrumbs

Breadcrumbs can work without the usage of list markup.

To show this type of Breadcrumbs you will need this code in down here. 

    
<Breadcrumb>
<BreadcrumbItem active>Home</BreadcrumbItem>
</Breadcrumb>
<Breadcrumb>
<BreadcrumbItem><a href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></BreadcrumbItem>
<BreadcrumbItem active>Library</BreadcrumbItem>
</Breadcrumb>
<Breadcrumb className="mb-0">
<BreadcrumbItem><a href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></BreadcrumbItem>
<BreadcrumbItem><a href="javascript:void(0)">Library</a></BreadcrumbItem>
<BreadcrumbItem active>Data</BreadcrumbItem>
</Breadcrumb>
